text: Hans Bangerter (born 10 June 1924) was General Secretary of the UEFA from 1960 to 1989. Starting in 1989 he served as chairman of the board of the Euro- Sportring Foundation. ==References== ==Sources== * https://web.archive.org/web/20090818032515/http://www.euro- sportring.de/jugendfussballturnier/ueber_euro_sportring/vorstand/ Category:20th-century Swiss people Category:UEFA officials Category:Living people Category:1924 births
title: Hans Bangerter
